sentences.english: This is a discussion of Chen Yun's theory of comprehensive balance.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了陳雲的綜合平衡論思想。

sentences.english: Chen Yun is the first person who puts forward theory about planned economy and market regulation.
sentences.chinese: 陳雲是提出計劃經濟與市場調節相結合理論的第一人。

sentences.english: "flew out on behalf of Chen Yun-yin, a" Hydrangea.
sentences.chinese: 陳雲賢代表乘機拋出了一個“繡球”。

sentences.english: Article on Chen Yun's re-thinking of the real value of agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 文章對陳雲的重農思想的現實價值進行了思考。

sentences.english: The DPP's chairwoman , Tsai Ing-wen, says her party will dog Mr Chen wherever he goes.
sentences.chinese: 民進黨主席蔡英文說，民進黨人會一直尾隨陳雲林。

sentences.english: During the meeting, Chen notably did not refer to Mr.
sentences.chinese: 在會議中陳雲林並未稱馬爲總統。

sentences.english: Cloud glances at the two men near her.
sentences.chinese: 陳雲瞥了一眼坐在她近旁的兩個人。
